title: Denotification as DRP Area: OSD, DRP (SRA) on being satisfied that it is necessary so to do, or when directed by the state GoM, shall denotify the DRP Area
clause_text: Denotification as DRP Area: OSD, DRP (SRA) on being satisfied that it is necessary so to do, or when directed by the state GoM, shall denotify the DRP Area.
section: Definition of Slum, Pavement, Structure of hut, planning sectors and related terms:
